job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-14T17:20:56.000Z", "description": "

POSITION

(REMOTE) Software Engineer \u2013 Web Apps


COMPANY OVERVIEW

Founded in 2011, privately held TransformativeMed, Inc., headquartered in Seattle, Washington, is the world-wide leader in developing Cerner and Epic integrated solutions that enable hospitals and health systems to modernize their Electronic Health Record (EHR). 

 

Our mission is simple: Make clinician\u2019s lives easier and improve patient safety by simplifying the medical software experience through embedded applications and ancillary tools.


POSITION OVERVIEW

TransformativeMed is seeking a mid or senior front-end leaning full-stack software engineer.

 

The primary focus of this position will be front-end development of the Core Diabetes App using JavaScript (jQuery/React) and other related web technologies. However, competency in middle-ware/back-end technologies is desired as occasional RESTful API work with PHP/Postgres will be needed.

 

This position will also have the opportunity to collaborate with our other development teams but will remain predominately focused on the Core Diabetes App to start. 


COMPETENCIES & ESSENTIAL ATTRIBUTES

\u00b7  Ability and desire to work in a team setting, collaborating with product management, developers, customers and clinicians is expected

\u00b7  Proficient written and verbal communication skills

\u00b7  Thrive in a dynamic start-up environment

\u00b7  Eagerness to learn

\u00b7  Ability to work with a degree of technical ambiguity


ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS

\u00b7  Refactor existing legacy jQuery application into new standardized React product

\u00b7  Improve existing features for legacy application versions

\u00b7  Provide detailed product documentation for your contributions

\u00b7  Collaborate with the Solutions Delivery team to deliver and support deployments for new and existing clients as needed with occasional after-hours tasks

\u00b7  Provide Tier-3 support for client-reported issues as needed 


REQUIRED SKILLS

\u00b7  Bachelor\u2019s degree or equivalent relevant work experience

\u00b7  4+ years experience of front-end development with JavaScript

  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • JavaScript: jQuery and React, Angular or similar SPA Frameworks
  • Responsive/Cross-Browser Web Design
  • Templating engines (MustacheJS/Handlebars)

\u00b7  2+ years experience of back-end development

  • PHP or NodeJS
  • SQL
  • Apache or Nginx

\u00b7  Experience with industry standard development tools/practices

  • Git and GitHub
  • JSON/XML/WebSockets/SOAP/RESTful APIs
  • Virtualization technology (Vagrant/Docker/VirtualBox/VMWare/KVM)
  • Waterfall and Agile development methodologies
  • Knowledge of common software development patterns


BONUS SKILLS

\u00b7  Previous healthcare development experience with Cerner CCL, mPages, or PowerChart

\u00b7  Linux system administration and scripting (CentOS/RedHat/Bash)

\u00b7  CI/CD Pipeline configuration (Jenkins, Bamboo, GitHub CI)

\u00b7  Automated testing experience (WebDriver, Mocha, Protractor)

\u00b7  Knowledge of JavaScript transpilers/minifiers (Babel, Webpack, Typescript)

\u00b7  Cordova development


SUPERVISORY RESPONSIBILITY

\u00b7  None


PERFORMANCE & SUCCESS MEASURES

\u00b7  Growth in application/infrastructure knowledge for our product suite and related EHR application/infrastructure knowledge

\u00b7  Shippable development contributions to the core company products with minimal rework

\u00b7  Effective and timely technical support for complex issue escalation

\u00b7  Ability to work effectively and collaboratively with the TransformativeMed team

\u00b7  Consistent contributions to code/product documentation


COMPANY BENEFITS

\u00b7  Employee-centric culture, we consider and contribute to your career growth 

\u00b7  Competitive pay

\u00b7  Unlimited PTO and flexible work schedules

\u00b7  Health/dental/vision/disability insurance


OUR APPLICATIONS

Core Mobile App \u2013 An iOS/Android application that presents rich, actionable EHR information in a format unique to each clinical specialty\u2019s priorities. Clinical teams caring for a patient have what they need, when they need it, can organize rounds, convey discharge readiness, conduct handoffs, and manage their patient lists. As status and situations change, smart notifications and secure messaging ensure the right information is provided to act.


Core Work Manager App \u2013 An EHR-embedded application that can create any number of patient lists, group and filter them based on the team\u2019s specialty or individual\u2019s needs, and view data in their preferred format. Built-in capabilities securely synchronize tasks; route alerts, notifications, and secure messages across the entire care team.


Core Diabetes App \u2013 An EHR-embedded application that standardizes and streamlines the management of patients with diabetes, ensuring patient safety from admission to discharge. By presenting workflow wizards, visualizing important clinical data, and providing a comprehensive dashboard of diabetic patients, the Core Diabetes App helps clinicians effectively and quickly treat diabetic conditions.

 

Equal Opportunity Employer

TransformativeMed is an equal opportunity employer and is committed to diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We prohibit discrimination and harassment of any kind based on race, color, sex, religion, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, genetic information, pregnancy, or any other protected characteristic as outlined by federal, state, or local laws.


This policy applies to all employment practices within our organization, including hiring, recruiting, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, leave of absence, compensation, benefits, training, and apprenticeship. TransformativeMed makes hiring decisions based solely on qualifications, merit, and business needs at the time.

 

Other Duties

Please note this job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job. Duties, responsibilities, and activities may change at any time with or without notice.
